data.text: @VWPeetso And speaking for myself, if I can feel compassion in the face of violence, others can too. We choose, I agree, but it doesn’t have to be 1 or 0. If that’s all we’ve got, we’re lost
@VWPeetso I give animals more credit for having a far greater emotional range than that. And humans have the capacity for super cooperation, beyond most animals. We can do better
